title: Jam Kamal acknowledges Punjab govt’s cooperation
content:
LAHORE, Jan 10 (APP):Chief Minister Balochistan Jam Kamal Khan has thanked Punjab Chief Minister Sardar Usman Buzdar for extending cooperation and launching rescue services in his province.
In a letter, he said that the Punjab government extended significant support for the launch of rescue services in Balochistan and “we appreciate this cooperation on part of the Punjab government”, said a handout issued here on Friday.
“Our partnership with Punjab would be further strengthened in future,” he added. Jam Kamal Khan said that participation in the passing-out parade of paramedics for medical emergency response centres project in Lahore was a memorable moment for him.
Sardar Usman Buzdar said that serving the people of Balochistan was a matter of pride for him. “We will have to work hard jointly for progress and prosperity of the country,” he added.
shb/asm/rsd
